ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p:
Research in our laboratory is supported by
10.13039/100000002 NIH
grants 1R01AI127429, 75N93019C00051, 1R01NS111242, 2U19AI089992 (to A.I.). We also thank Womenâ€™s Health Research at Yale Pilot Project Program, Emergent Ventures at the Mercatus Center, George Mason University, Mathers Foundation, and the Ludwig Family Foundation for their support of COVID-19 research in the laboratory. A.I. is an Investigator of the Howard Hughes Medical Institute. BioRender was used to make all figures. Due to space constraints, we regret our inability to cite all relevant studies.
